channel.title: YubiKey on Alex Norell

item.title: How To Set Up YubiKey On macOS
item.description: This is a follow up to the How To Set Up GPG on macOS guide We’ll build on the GPG key configuration to move the storage off the machine itself to a physical key. We’ll also cover setting up the YubiKey for other services and uses, like WebAuthn. By the end of the guide you will: Disable YubiKey OTP Move GPG keys to a YubiKey Disable the macOS Smart Card prompt Add a YubiKey to Web Services Disable SMS Authentication Some requirements:
